RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT a.contract_ref_no, a.user_ref_no, a.product_code, d.product_description, a.counterparty, f.short_name, a.contract_ccy, e.ccy_name, b.principal_outstanding_bal from oltbs_contract a, oltbs_contract_balance b, OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD c, oltms_product d, cytms_ccy_defn e, oltms_customer f, oltbs_contract_master g, oltbs_contract_preference h where a.module_code = 'LB' AND a.branch = global.current_branch and a.contract_ref_no = g.contract_ref_no and a.latest_version_no = g.version_no and a.product_code = d.product_code and a.contract_ccy = e.ccy_code and a.counterparty = f.customer_no and f.RECORD_STAT = 'O' and a.CONTRACT_STATUS ='A' and not exists (select 1 from oltbs_contract_rollover r where contract_ref_no = g.contract_ref_no and nvl(r.roll_inst_status, 'X') in ('C', 'I', 'P') and version_no = (select max(version_no) from oltbs_contract_rollover where contract_ref_no = g.contract_ref_no)) and a.product_type = 'L' and a.contract_ref_no = b.contract_ref_no and a.product_code = c.product and c.prod_sch_type = 'N' AND (c.payment_method = 'B' OR (c.payment_method IN ('D','T') AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM oltb_contract_preference k WHERE k.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no AND discounted_sch = 'Y' AND version_no = (SELECT MAX(version_no) FROM oltb_contract_preference m WHERE m.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no))))) AND g.LC_DRAWDOWN = 'N' AND nvl(g.swing_line,'N')='N' AND nvl(g.Ancillary, 'N') = 'N' and a.contract_ref_no NOT IN (SELECT contract_ref_no from lbtbs_contract_split_master where split_status = 'U' or auth_status = 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from oltbs_contract_rollover e where e.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no AND e.version_no = a.latest_version_no AND e.roll_inst_status IN ('I', 'P')) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR WHERE product_code = a.product_code AND branch_code = GLOBAL.current_branch AND user_id = GLOBAL.user_id) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM oltms_product k, OLVW_USER_PRODUCTS S WHERE S.USER_ID = GLOBAL.user_id AND S.PRODUCT_CODE = k.PRODUCT_CODE AND S.PRODUCT_CODE = a.product_code) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM smvws_user_branches b WHERE b.User_id = Global.user_id AND b.Branch_code = a.branch) AND a.contract_ref_no = h.contract_ref_no AND a.latest_version_no = h.version_no AND nvl(h.PARTIAL_PREPMT_ALLOWED, 'N') = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS ( Select 1 from LFTB_MARGIN_REVN_ACTIVATED_CONT mrg where mrg.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no )

SELECT a.contract_ref_no, a.user_ref_no, a.contract_ccy, b.principal_outstanding_bal, d.maturity_date, d.value_date FROM oltbs_contract a, oltbs_contract_balance b, oltms_product_master_LD c,oltbs_contract_master d WHERE a.branch = sypks_utils.get_branch(?) and a.module_code = 'LB' and a.contract_status in ('A', 'Y')and a.auth_status = 'A' and a.contract_ref_no = d.contract_ref_no and a.latest_version_no = d.version_no and not exists(select 1 from oltbs_contract_rollover r where contract_ref_no = d.contract_ref_no and nvl(r.roll_inst_status,'X') in ('C','I','P') and version_no = (select max(version_no) from oltbs_contract_rollover where contract_ref_no = d.contract_ref_no)) and a.contract_ref_no not in(select child_ref_no from LBTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_DETAIL where contract_ref_no= ? and child_status in ('U','F')) AND d.tranche_ref_no =(SELECT tranche_ref_no FROM oltbs_contract_master WHERE contract_ref_no= ? AND version_no =(SELECT MAX(version_no) FROM oltbs_contract_master WHERE contract_ref_no = ?)) and d.value_date <= ? and d.maturity_date >= ? and a.contract_ref_no <> ? and a.contract_ref_no not in(select child_ref_no from LBTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_DETAIL where contract_ref_no = ? and merge_serial_no =?) and a.counterparty = ? and a.contract_ccy = ? and a.product_type = 'L' and b.principal_outstanding_bal > 0 and a.contract_ref_no = b.contract_ref_no and a.product_code = c.product and c.prod_sch_type = 'N' /*and c.payment_method = 'B'*/AND (c.payment_method = 'B' OR (c.payment_method IN ('D','T') AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM oltb_contract_preference k WHERE k.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no AND discounted_sch = 'Y' AND version_no = (SELECT MAX(version_no) FROM oltb_contract_preference m WHERE m.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no))))) and d.lc_drawdown='N' AND a.contract_ref_no NOT IN (SELECT contract_ref_no from lbtbs_contract_split_master where split_status = 'U' or auth_stat = 'U') AND a.contract_ref_no NOT IN (SELECT contract_ref_no from LBTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_MASTER where merge_status = 'U' or auth_status = 'U') AND a.contract_ref_no NOT IN (select d.child_ref_no from LBTB_CONTRACT_MERGE_MASTER m, LBTB_CONTRACT_MERGE_DETAIL d where m.contract_ref_no = d.contract_ref_no and m.merge_serial_no = d.merge_serial_no and m.auth_stat = 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 from oltbs_contract_rollover e where e.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no AND e.version_no = a.latest_version_no AND e.roll_inst_status IN ('I','P')) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM olvw_avl_prod_br_usr WHERE product_code = a.product_code AND branch_code = sypks_utils.get_branch(?) AND user_id = GLOBAL.user_id) AND NOT EXISTS ( Select 1 from LFTB_MARGIN_REVN_ACTIVATED_CONT mrg where mrg.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no )
